definitions.definition: To a great extent or degree .
examples: Not very many (of them) had been damaged.
She's so very similar to her mother.
In the end, the tickets  didn't turn out so very expensive.

definitions.definition: Conforming to fact , reality or rule ; true .
Used to firmly establish that nothing else surpasses in some respect.
examples: He was the very best runner there.
This is my very own treehouse.

main_definition: To a great extent or degree .
secondary_definitions: Conforming to fact , reality or rule ; true .
( with superlatives ) Used to firmly establish that nothing else surpasses in some respect.
